mapper.sql: indicators_id, p_id, indicators_name, evaluation_method, user_id, assessment_criteria, instructions, fraction, indicators_status, release_date, expiration_date, assessment_year, CREATED_USER, CREATED_TIME, UPDATED_USER, UPDATED_TIME, DEL
mapper.update: update assessment_indicators set expiration_date=#{expirationDate} where assessment_year=#{assessmentYear}
mapper.select:
select * from assessment_indicators where (indicators_Name ='县（市、区）绩效任务' or indicators_Name ='机制创新' or indicators_Name ='正向激励加分' or indicators_Name ='绩效减分' ) and parent_Id=0
and assessment_year =#{year}

select indicators_id as id,parent_Id,assessment_Type,indicators_name as title from assessment_indicators where assessment_Type > 0 UNION select detail_id as id ,assessment_id as parent_Id,4,assessment_criteria as title from assessment_indicators_detail
select * from assessment_indicators where indicators_Name=#{indicatorsName} and parent_Id=#{pid}
select sum(a.fraction) from assessment_indicators_detail a left join assessment_indicators b on a.indicators_id=b.indicators_id where b.assessment_year=#{year}

select count(distinct c.unit_id) from assessment_indicators a left join assessment_indicators_detail b on a.indicators_id=b.indicators_id left join unit_assessment c on c.detail_id=b.detail_id where a.assessment_year =#{assessmentYear}

select indicators_id as id,parent_Id,assessment_Type,indicators_name as title from assessment_indicators where assessment_Type > 0
and indicators_name like "%"#{content}"%"
select indicators_id as id,parent_Id,assessment_Type,indicators_name as title from assessment_indicators where indicators_id=#{parentId}
select indicators_id as id,parent_Id,assessment_Type,indicators_name as title from assessment_indicators where parent_id=#{id}
